# Crypto-2｜Signin

## 做题历程 & 感想

和 [Crypto-1｜现代密码学入门指北](https://brucejqs.github.io/MyNotebook/blog/CTF/2024.9%20MoeCTF/Crypto/Crypto-1/#crypto-1/) 完全一致，就多了那么一步（笑）

纯纯给 Bruce 送分涨信心（bushi
***
## Writeup

阅读所给的代码：

``` python
from Crypto.Util.number import*
from secret import flag


m = bytes_to_long(flag)
p = getPrime(1024)
q = getPrime(1024)
n = p*q
e = 65537
c = pow(m,e,n)
pq = (p-1)*(q-2)
qp = (q-1)*(p-2)
p_q = p + q


print(f"{c = }")
print(f"{pq = }")
print(f"{qp = }")
print(f"{n = }")
print(f"{p_q = }")
'''
c = 
pq = 
qp = 
n = 
p_q = 
'''
```

跟 Crypto-1 不一样的就是少了 $p,q$ 多了 $pq,qp,p\_q$ ，三个式子还求不出 $p$ 和 $q$ ？（笑）

我们有：

$$
\begin{aligned}
pq &= (p-1)\times(q-2)\\
qp &= (q-1)\times(p-2)\\
p\_q &= p+q
\end{aligned}
$$

很轻易我们就能得到：

$$
\begin{aligned}
pq-qp&=(p\times q-q-2p+2)-(q\times p-p-2q+2)=q-p\\
p\_q&=p+q\\
\end{aligned}
$$

$$
\therefore\begin{cases}
p=\frac{p\_q-pq+qp}{2}\\
q=\frac{p\_q+pq-qp}{2}
\end{cases}
$$

那么就编写 python 程序如下：

``` python
from Crypto.Util.number import long_to_bytes

c = 
pq = 
qp = 
n = 
p_q = 
e = 65537

p = (p_q - qp + pq) // 2
q = (p_q + qp - pq) // 2

phi = (p - 1) * (q - 1)
d = pow(e, -1, phi)
m = pow(c, d, n)
print(long_to_bytes(m))
```

运行即可得到 flag：`moectf{Just_4_signin_ch4ll3ng3_for_y0u}`
